path.style: stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(204, 204, 204); fill: none;
stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(153, 153, 153); fill: none;
stroke-width: 35; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: none;
